name: It's Break Time!
description:
It's break time! Time to head to the pantry to get lunch. Eat the falling sandwiches by moving up to them with the left and right arrow keys, or with the 'A' and 'D' keys.

Made for Mini Jam 87: Break.

-----

SFX:

  • "squish.m4a" by Piotr123 (https://freesound.org/people/Piotr123/sounds/474059/)
  • "cartoon bite.WAV" by DrMaysta (https://freesound.org/people/DrMaysta/sounds/531245/)

BGM:

  •  Music: Samovar Party by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
    Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/
  • "Kicking bullies" by Komiku (https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/24689/)
